plot: Sadness, loss and disappointment as seen through the eyes of Zoey, a prostitute trying to make a better life for herself only to find that no matter how hard you try, it may never be enough.
title: The Purest Blue
plot_es: Sadness, loss and disappointment as seen through the eyes of Zoey, a prostitute trying to make a better life for herself only to find that no matter how hard you try, it may never be enough.
plot_en: Sadness, loss and disappointment as seen through the eyes of Zoey, a prostitute trying to make a better life for herself only to find that no matter how hard you try, it may never be enough.
